conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: HENRY, PRINCE OF WALES, afterwards King Henry the Fifth.
Lord CHIEF JUSTICE of the King’s Bench.
A SERVANT of the Chief Justice.
TRAVERS and MORTON, retainers of Northumberland.
MOULDY, SHADOW, WART, FEEBLE, and BULLCALF, recruits.
MISTRESS QUICKLY, hostess of a tavern in Eastcheap.
Lords and Attendants; Porter, Drawers, Musicians, Beadles, Grooms, etc.
A Dancer, speaker of the epilogue.
